“One of the things I’ve noticed in my work related to #HIV and #opioidaddiction, is that we have looked at it as a moral failing. The #socialdeterminantsofhealth is at the root of this issue. You can’t address addiction w/o talking about trauma.”

“We know that ppl are self medicating. So many things are happening that policies are creating in the first place. This effort helps to dig into the root causes and the resources to do something about it.” #TheCAREAct #healthcareforthehomeless

“There’s not a strong conversation about harm reduction outside of #naloxone. We need to lower threshold to treatment. We can make treatment mobile, taking the service to them. We need to rethink what treatment is and how we provide it.” #healthcareforthehomeless
“There must be the capacity of workforce and drug treatment providers to create a seamless system to onboard former addicts back into gainful employment.” #healthcareforthehomeless
